dialogue.text: Say, what are you doing on your laptop? I've never seen that before.
Ah, I was just finishing up my sprites on Flipaclip. I don't have a phone so I use bluestacks on my pc.
Right now I'm working on a character called Lucario BF, suggested by my man Seth the Lucario. He has a lot of ideas. Really cool.
Pretty neat right? I just have to finish this one and I can start working on my songs!
Can you make me a song?
Maybe, my todo list is pretty full. I have a lot of suggestions, a lot from Seth the Lucario, the community, the comments section..
I'll probably make one for you, depends on time really. You seem like a chill dude.
ooh, such interesting paintings, what are they?
My friends, they come from different universes. I could call up a few if you'd like.
Alr then, lemme just save Lucario BF real quick and I'll hit 'em up.
